title: Citi-Sponsored Event Promotes Investment in Brazilian Infrastructure
summary: São Paulo - Businesses around the world are seeking opportunities to leverage their businesses during the 2014 Soccer World Cup and 2016 Olympic Games. In Brazil, the opportunities are even greater; these are catalyzing events that give our country a chance to show itself as fertile ground for doing business. tag-1: Citi-Sponsored Event Promotes Investment in Brazilian Infrastructure
tag-3: São Paulo – Businesses around the world are seeking opportunities to leverage their businesses during the 2014 Soccer World Cup and 2016 Olympic Games. In Brazil, the opportunities are even greater; these are catalyzing events that give our country a chance to show itself as fertile ground for doing business. For this to be true, however, investment in infrastructure is required. Brazil's states and municipalities are searching for partnership opportunities in this area, including public/private financing.
tag-4: As part of its commitment to make its clients' projects a reality in the private as well as the public sectors, Citi Brazil is sponsoring an informational event in Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, for investors interested in leveraging infrastructure-related businesses.
tag-5: The event in question is a seminar on June 12 and 13 for representatives of state and municipal governments and federal officials, as well as private sector investors, financers, concession holders and operators.
tag-6: It will be a great venue to make contacts and examine opportunities.
tag-7: Confirmed participants include: Minas Gerais Governor Antonio Augusto Junho Anastasia; the federal government's PPP coordinator, Isaac Averbuch; the Secretary of Planning for Amazonas state, Aírton Ângelo; the Secretary of Finance of Paraná, Luiz Hauly; the Finance Director of Hidrovias do Brasil, Milson Mundim; the Finance Director of Norte Energia, Marcelo Perillo; and the President of Companhia de Saneamento de Alagoas, Álvaro Menezes.
tag-8: Organizer: LatinFinance First Brazilian Finance and Infrastructure Summit Dayrell Hotel & Convention Center, Belo Horizonte, Rua Espirito Santo, 901 June 12, 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  June 13, 8:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m.
